amendment.description: Amendment prohibits the use of funds to implement procedures that do not give small business concerns owned and controlled by veterans any preference to obtaining the contracts under the Small Business Act.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to prohibit the use of funds to be used for using procedures that do not give small business concerns owned and controlled by veterans any preference to obtaining the contracts under the Small Business Act.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Fitzpatrick amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
